tool_description: Tracks and correlates threat activities across time to identify ongoing campaigns and their evolution patterns.

threat_indicators.description: Threat indicators to track across campaigns

time_window.description: Time window for campaign tracking in ISO 8601 format

attributed_actors.description: Known or suspected threat actors for this campaign

correlation_threshold.description: Minimum correlation score to link activities (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid time window: Time window must be a valid ISO 8601 duration
Insufficient indicators: Need multiple indicators to track campaign progression
Correlation threshold out of range: Threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Timeline construction failed: Unable to construct coherent campaign timeline
No campaign activity found: No correlated threat activity found in specified time window
usage: Provide threat indicators and time window to track campaign activities. Include attributed actors for better correlation.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the tracked campaign

activity_clusters.description: Grouped clusters of related threat activities

campaign_status.description: Current status of the campaign (active, dormant, concluded)

evolution_pattern.description: Observed evolution pattern of the campaign tactics
